verses.verse: SHa'ul <S%G3972><s%>, a servant <S%G1401><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> an emissary <S%G652><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> of 'Elohim's <S%G2316><s%> elect <S%G1588><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the acknowledging <S%G1922><s%> of the truth <S%G225><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is after <S%G2596><s%> godliness <S%G2150><s%>;

In <S%G1909><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, that cannot lie <S%G893><s%>, promised <S%G1861><s%> <S%G5662><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the world <S%G166><s%> began <S%G5550><s%>;

But <S%G1161><s%> hath <S%G5319><s%> in due <S%G2398><s%> times <S%G2540><s%> manifested <S%G5319><s%> <S%G5656><s%> his <S%G846><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> preaching <S%G2782><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is committed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto me <S%G1473><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the Mitzvah <S%G2003><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%>;

To Titus <S%G5103><s%>, mine own <S%G1103><s%> son <S%G5043><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the common <S%G2839><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>: Grace <S%G5485><s%>, mercy <S%G1656><s%>, and peace <S%G1515><s%>, from <S%G575><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%>.

For this <S%G5127><s%> cause <S%G5484><s%> left I <S%G2641><s%> <S%G5627><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Crete <S%G2914><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> thou shouldest set in order <S%G1930><s%> <S%G5672><s%> the things that are wanting <S%G3007><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ordain <S%G2525><s%> <S%G5661><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> in every <S%G2596><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> had appointed <S%G1299><s%> <S%G5668><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>:

If any <S%G1536><s%> be <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> blameless <S%G410><s%>, the husband <S%G435><s%> of one <S%G3391><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> accused <S%G1722><s%> <S%G2724><s%> of riot <S%G810><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> unruly <S%G506><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> a bishop <S%G1985><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> <S%G5748><s%> be <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> blameless <S%G410><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> the steward <S%G3623><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>; not <S%G3361><s%> selfwilled <S%G829><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> soon angry <S%G3711><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> given to wine <S%G3943><s%>, no <S%G3361><s%> striker <S%G4131><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> given to filthy lucre <S%G146><s%>;
But <S%G235><s%> a lover of hospitality <S%G5382><s%>, a lover of good men <S%G5358><s%>, sober <S%G4998><s%>, just <S%G1342><s%>, holy <S%G3741><s%>, temperate <S%G1468><s%>;

Holding fast <S%G472><s%> <S%G5740><s%> the faithful <S%G4103><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> as <S%G2596><s%> he hath been taught <S%G1322><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he may be <S%G5600><s%> <S%G5753><s%> able <S%G1415><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> sound <S%G5198><s%> <S%G5723><s%> doctrine <S%G1319><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> to exhort <S%G3870><s%> <S%G5721><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to convince <S%G1651><s%> <S%G5721><s%> the gainsayers <S%G483><s%> <S%G5723><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> unruly <S%G506><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> vain talkers <S%G3151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> deceivers <S%G5423><s%>, specially <S%G3122><s%> they of <S%G1537><s%> the b'ritmilah <S%G4061><s%>:

Whose <S%G3739><s%> mouths <S%G1993><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> <S%G5748><s%> be stopped <S%G1993><s%> <S%G5721><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> subvert <S%G396><s%> <S%G5719><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> houses <S%G3624><s%>, teaching <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5723><s%> things which <S%G3739><s%> they ought <S%G1163><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>, for <S%G5484><s%> filthy <S%G150><s%> lucre's <S%G2771><s%> sake <S%G5484><s%>.

One <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> themselves <S%G846><s%>, even a prophet <S%G4396><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> own <S%G2398><s%>, said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, The Cretians <S%G2912><s%> are alway <S%G104><s%> liars <S%G5583><s%>, evil <S%G2556><s%> beasts <S%G2342><s%>, slow <S%G692><s%> bellies <S%G1064><s%>.

This <S%G3778><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> true <S%G227><s%>. Wherefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G156><s%> rebuke <S%G1651><s%> <S%G5720><s%> them <S%G846><s%> sharply <S%G664><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they may be sound <S%G5198><s%> <S%G5725><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%>;

Not <S%G3361><s%> giving heed <S%G4337><s%> <S%G5723><s%> to Jewish <S%G2451><s%> fables <S%G3454><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Mitzvot <S%G1785><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>, that turn from <S%G654><s%> <S%G5734><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%>.

Unto the pure <S%G2513><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are pure <S%G3303><s%> <S%G2513><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> unto them that are defiled <S%G3392><s%> <S%G5772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unbelieving <S%G571><s%> is nothing <S%G3762><s%> pure <S%G2513><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> mind <S%G3563><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> is defiled <S%G3392><s%> <S%G5769><s%>.

They profess <S%G3670><s%> <S%G5719><s%> that they know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5760><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> in works <S%G2041><s%> they deny <S%G720><s%> <S%G5736><s%> him, being <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> abominable <S%G947><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> dis`Ovedient <S%G545><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> reprobate <S%G96><s%>.
